member.name: M:Jaeger.Senders.Thrift.HttpSender.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Jaeger REST endpoint consuming jaeger.thrift, e.g http://localhost:14268/api/traces

member.name: T:Jaeger.Senders.Thrift.ThriftSender
member.summary: JaegerThriftTransport is the base class for transporting spans from C# into Jaeger. It provides the basic implementation of serializing spans but leaves the buffering and sending of the serialized spans to concrete implementations.

member.name: T:Jaeger.Senders.Thrift.UdpSender
member.summary: JaegerUdpTransport provides an implementation to transport spans over UDP using Compact Thrift. It handles making sure payloads efficiently use the UDP packet size by filling up as much of a UDP message it can before sending.

member.name: M:Jaeger.Senders.Thrift.UdpSender.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor expects Jaeger running on and port .
